name: THE TICKLE - Bonus Issue #1 - alterHEN
description:
Art zine focused on Hic et Nunc artists and writers.

Our first bonus issue is dedicated to the green NFT project @alterHEN - a space to highlight the potential of eco-friendly NFT's to positively affect the art market, in a way that focuses on the art itself, away from the distractions of a sales-led marketplace.

This issue includes work by Eli Joteva, Katya Kanke-Zaikanova, Luluxxx, Kelly Richardson, Patrick Tresset, Laurent La Torpille, Andreas Rau, Iskra Velitchkova, Iñigo Bilbao, Diane Drubay, SOMATICBITS, Patrick Jamora, Mihai Grecu, Alexandra Crouwers, Bernardo Liu, Zaki Jawhari, Auni Seiva, Anna Malina Zemlianski, Wily Guys & Bjorn Calleja.

Zine created by artists Wily Guys (@guyswily) and Maia Mellier (@maiamellier)
